resolution.summary: Completed all 4 Phase 2 tasks: (1) Added HDLToolsError base class and updated 13 exception classes across 12 files, (2) Moved hdllib imports in highlvl.py to lazy imports fixing layering violation, (3) Added gen_HDLStringConstant to Verilog codegen, (4) Consolidated gen_HDLStringConstant into base class. All 122 tests pass.
